data.author: ZonFire99

changelog.release_notes:
Fixed centering and removed leading zeros on 12 Hr format. 
 - Adding and removing leading zeros will be released later on.

Added all UTCs for remote workers

Configure Bluetooth Disconnect Color

Made Icons slightly larger.

Added Sunrise/Sunset as an option instead of UTC/GMT/ZULU

Added Round Support! 
	- Steps are centered at the bottom for the time being. 

Configuration page re-write.

Send me your color configs and I might add them as a preset!

Added Weather Conditions.

Added Persistent Storage for the Weather Data. 

Round Support Coming Soon....

Temperature bug squashed!

Added toggle for hiding the date.

Big Update!

Added color configuration for all elements.

Added hour offset for people that work in multiple time zones.
Change the dual time zone label to anything you want! Within 4 characters....

Added ability to hide all elements.

--
Bugs:

There is a known bug with switch temperature formats, I am working on fixing this. I apologize for any inconvenience.

Fixed time offset interval to display correctly. 

Sorry about that everyone.

Added:
 Time and Date formatting, finally.
 Tired of running late? You can now set you watch up to 30 min fast.
 Weather update intervals.

Fixed:
  Spelling.

Added color configuration
Added toggle for the dreaded ZULU time
Added toggle for Celsius and Fahrenheit  

More coming soon.

data.description:
I really liked the LECO font. This is a minimalist face with battery conservation in mind. If you have any issues or feature suggestions please send me an email and I'll get back with you. If your tired of running late to events or work, you can set your watch 1 - 30 min fast. Which is a feature not found on any other watchface in the App Store. Enjoy!

Features include:

- 12 hour/24 hour time.
- Date formatting
- Bluetooth disconnect indicator with vibration.
- Current Temperature and Weather Conditions with up to 120 min update time to save battery.
- Weather update intervals. 15, 20, 45, 60, 90, 120 min.
- Celsius or Fahrenheit format.
- Step counter.
- Battery percentage indicator.
- Color configurable for all elements.
- Tired of running late? You can now set you watch up to 30 min fast.
- Hide all elements.
- Hour offset for people that work in multiple time zones.
- Change the dual time zone label to anything you want! Within 4 characters.

Recent Update:

Added all UTCs for remote workers

Configure Bluetooth Disconnect Color

Made icons slightly larger.

Added Sunrise/Sunset as an option instead of UTC/GMT/ZULU

Added Round Support! 
	- Steps are centered at the bottom for the time being. 

Configuration page re-write.

Send me your color configs and I might add them as a preset!


Future:

Something to fill the lower left corner... Email me your ideas! :)

Check me out at:

- https://www.facebook.com/ZonFireApps/
- https://codepen.io/ZonFire99

I have a day job but I still accept donations :). Either way enjoy!

latest_release.release_notes:
Fixed centering and removed leading zeros on 12 Hr format. 
 - Adding and removing leading zeros will be released later on.

data.title: Simply LECO
